MAIN_MESSAGE: There is a power cut in the FK1 postcode area of Slamannan. We had no advance warning of this and only became aware of it at 2.19pm. Our engineers are on their way to the Binniehill Road substation to investigate a blown fuse and our team will work to get your power back on as quickly and as safely as possible by 5.45pm. Once they arrive, or when we receive any update regarding the cause, we will be able to provide you with more information. We apologise for the inconvenience and thank you for your patience. This message was updated at 3.07pm on Saturday 20th February 2021.
